flashmodes: Modes : Smart Flash, Auto, Auto+Red-eye reduction, Fill-in, Fill-in+Red-eye reduction, 1st Curtain, 2nd Curtain, OFF
isoequivalent: ISO Equivalent : Auto, 100, 200, 400, 800, 1600, 3200, 6400, 12800 (1 or 1/3EV step) * AUTO ISO Upper Level is Selectable. (Up to ISO3200)
focusingmodes: Modes : Single AF, Continuous AF, MF
